task.summary: Default task
Product related code refactoring and major structural changes.Also some changes in integration domain so as to match incoming events to product events.
Product related code refactoring and major structural changes.Also some changes in integration domain so as to match incoming events to product events.
Split product performance tracker into InstantaneousTracker and AggregationTracker.Also completed user story for registering a product with revised attributes.
changed the repository names to depict them as view repository, moved the db host name and port name out of default.java and injected from application.properties
Added new SimpleLinerForecaster to take care of automation of forecasting whene there is no data available.

Changed Pricing Trigger to trigger prices when total subscription count between forecast and actuals is beyond threshold. Used Interpolator based TotalSubscriptionCountFinder for a day to interpolate forecast data from monthly to daily.

Established integration between subscriber domain and product domain. Received SubscriptionActivitySummaryEvent and udated subscription count of appropriate bucket. Modified PriceBucketView structure by eliminating productversionid as primary key and introducing ProductWisePriceBucketId as primary key
Mapping Converters for ProductwisePriceBucketId
deprecated the PseudoActuals and tried to remove their calls from ForcastController and Product
modified application.properties file to inject SimpleLinearForecaster in the Forecaster chain. Modified limits of each forecaster.
modified document
Un-deprecated the PseudoActuals and injected SimpleLinearDemandForecaster
Modified MappingMongoConverter definition.
Corrected logic of product pricing trigger
Introduced new view for TaggedPrice versions and updated the same in the listener
Revamped read side of business account. Moved business logic out of event sourcing handlers in price bucket.
Defect fixes
Implemented user story : when purchase price/MRP of a product undergoes change..it should trigger offer price calculation.
Modified the logic to receive latest MRP/purchase price always form latest tagged price version and not from latest price bucket.
Defect fixes
Changes LocalDate from LoalDateTime for all entities except PriceBucket
Defect fixes due to changes to LocalDate from LoalDateTime for all entities except PriceBucket
code cleanup for duplicate/unused things
code cleanup
BusinessAccount corrections.
moved forecaster module to common...in progress
moved everything from MonthlyCommonOPeratingExpense to BusinessAccount and its controller. Now it should be deleted.
Addition of manual forecast automatically enables addition of PseudoActuals by interpolating the forecast

Oerall refactoring of BusinessAccount domain- Separation of request for different provisions, Added support for storing each transactions,removed CommonOperatingExpense aggregate ,its corresponding commands,command handlers, views and listeners.. still work in progress
Add listeners to update read side...in progress
pom fix to make all domains up. Modification to Business Command handlers
Implemented couple of user stories in Business domain..
calculate revenue,cost and profit per product... in progress
Implementing product wise and total purchase cost,revenue and profit in the incremental manner.. in progress.. to be updated in businessAccount
establish communication between Product and BusinessAccount domain..in progress
User story to add excess profit to nodal account from product to business account ... in progress
updated revenue and profit coming form product to business account... the update is yet to be done on read side of business account.. in progress
Completing communication of BusinessAccount domain with other domain.. in progress.

Revamped read side of business account. Moved business logic out of event sourcing handlers in price bucket.
Implemented user story : when purchase price/MRP of a product undergoes change..it should trigger offer price calculation.
Modified the logic to receive latest MRP/purchase price always form latest tagged price version and not from latest price bucket.
